plot: Vanya is a young gypsy woman out to prove her worth to her abusive husband, Sandor, by pulling off a swindle of legendary proportions -- her target, a strange old woman with a decades old secret. Based on a classic American short story by Bordan Deal.
title: The Big Bajoor
plot_es: Vanya is a young gypsy woman out to prove her worth to her abusive husband, Sandor, by pulling off a swindle of legendary proportions -- her target, a strange old woman with a decades old secret. Based on a classic American short story by Bordan Deal.
